data.text: @thehill Thats funny cuz about a month ago I asked the VA Healthcare for testing. They told me my appointments would all be canceled until further notice if I want to be tested. I declined.  And I was fine but angry since my healthcare providers through the VA are Not at all helpful

@thehill Because nobody cares, most of us are vaccinated.

The simple fact is all remaining restrictions are nothing but racist Authoritarian abuse of our civil rights.
@thehill Half the country thinks Covid is fake so obviously half the tests would still be there.
@thehill I know the explanation, they don't work and the PLANDEMIC is DEAD
@LeightonLiles @thehill Are you folks not the same ones who were yelling how Biden was doing nothing?

@thehill Biden sent the Free Covid-19 Tests to the 2 million illegals which have been coming into this country. Over 2 billion dollars of tests have been given to illegals.. WHY?  Only an ignorant person like Biden can answer that one.
@thehill Because no sane parent would teat their kid unless forced to. It’s don’t ask don’t tell in the real world

@thehill They were supposed to be delivered by the USPS, directly to your address, which you gave when you signed up for them online... If they're not being picked up it's because they're not being delivered...
@thehill And China already cashed the check!
